Package com.example.hashhunter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QRAdapter.OnQRListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Comment
    Model class to represent a comment of qr code
    CommentController
    Controller for comment class, will be useful once we do more stuff with comment
    CustomComparator  
    DashboardActivity
    Contains 5 dashboard buttons that open other activities - will be fragments in the future
    DeleteGameCodeActivity
    Activity for deleting a game code as an Owner of the app (referred to as Admin from now on).
    DeletePlayerActivity
    This is the activity for deleting a player from the database as the owner of the app (referred to as admin from here on).
    ExploreActivity
    displays the leaderboard, which is able to sort based of a dropdown menu and display the users rank It also is able to search for player based on username and on profile code
    FirestoreController
    A controller class to interact with firestore
    GameCode
    A Model class that represent a GameCode object (QR code and associated metadata like points and location) Used as a schema to the database It has 4 different constructor for different kinds of object: with/without location and photos
    GameCodeController
    a controller for the gamecode class
    GameCodeList
    a class for displaying gamecodes in a listview
    GameCodePointsController
    Controller to hash strings and obtain points References: SHA-256 hashing from GeeksforGeeks; Aug 7th, 2019; https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/sha-256-hash-in-java/ References: hex to decimal from javatpoint; accessed Feb 22th, 2022; https://www.javatpoint.com/java-hex-to-decimal
    LeaderboardAdapter  
    LoginActivity
    This is the activity for user login for the first time If they scan a QR code, it logs them in if they are an existing user in the database If they register, it generates a unique ID for them and adds their information to the database reference: https://developer.android.com/training/basics/firstapp/starting-activity#java https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AD5qt7xoUU8 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Fc79qTq7yc
    MainActivity
    The Main activity for the app It checks to see if the user has ever logged into the app before If yes, it starts the Dashboard activity Otherwise, it starts the Login activity, which asks the user to either login using a QR code or register themselves if they are a first time user
    MainFragment  
    MapActivity  
    OwnerActivity
    Activity for deleting gamecodes and players.
    Photo
    A model class that represents a photo object, used as Schema to the database
    PhotoController
    Controller class to display image from url: - https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/how-to-load-any-image-from-url-without-using-any-dependency-in-android/ - https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11831188/how-to-get-bitmap-from-a-url-in-android
    Player
    This is a class that keeps track of a player
    PlayerDataController  
    PlayerList
    this is a controller class for a list of players
    ProfileActivity  
    QRAdapter  
    QRCommentAdapter  
    QRVisualizerActivity  
    QRVisualizerAdapter  
    RegisterActivity  
    ScanActivity
    References: QR code scanner/decoder from Yuriy Budiyev https://github.com/yuriy-budiyev/code-scanner License: MIT License Copyright (c) 2017 Yuriy Budiyev [yuriy.budiyev@yandex.ru] Opens scanner which uses Camera, after getting permissions, to get a string from a qrcode
    ScanSubmitActivity
    Has fields for user to submit qrcode title, location, and photo.
    SearchActivity
    Displays the results of searching for a player, shows "Player not found" if there is no player with that username otherwise shows the players username and on click goes to that players profile
